text: *3Through the portal, a weak magic tugs you from the Citadel.
Your feet hover over the floor as it shakes violently.

Pipes and pistons crash down in a muffled racket...
^

*1You clench your eyes, confident that the portal will bear you to safety.
^
*2It seems you got what you came here for, though not in the way you anticipated.

Power cannot simply be held... it must be used.
^
The following years are not easy for the surface world. Eventually, they learn

that joy and glory are found in strength.
^
*1You destroy those who oppose you. Eventually, even the humans bear your banner.
*2Can any empire challenge what you've built? Prophets teach that the

human spirit is stronger than anything. You fear that power is real...
^
*1Power you know will always be waiting.
